body_html:
@jph00 I've tested the performance using the version of 0.2.0 and master.
0.2.0

cudnn_lstm( 0): 1218.024 usecs (1217.732 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 1):  217.492 usecs ( 217.421 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 2):  242.652 usecs ( 242.833 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 3):  213.418 usecs ( 215.414 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 4):  224.442 usecs ( 225.205 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 5):  209.156 usecs ( 209.629 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 6):  205.160 usecs ( 205.521 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 7):  252.354 usecs ( 254.580 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 8):  223.564 usecs ( 225.150 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 9):  196.846 usecs ( 197.789 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(10):  210.176 usecs ( 211.501 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(11):  221.242 usecs ( 221.289 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(12):  204.554 usecs ( 205.599 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(13):  202.422 usecs ( 201.712 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(14):  198.292 usecs ( 199.836 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(15):  204.980 usecs ( 205.615 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(16):  200.478 usecs ( 201.707 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(17):  206.070 usecs ( 207.583 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(18):  199.546 usecs ( 199.801 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(19):  218.882 usecs ( 219.309 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(20):  203.382 usecs ( 205.625 usecs cpu)

master

cudnn_lstm( 0): 3244.746 usecs (3215.767 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 1):   49.900 usecs (  21.478 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 2):   49.734 usecs (  21.531 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 3):   50.644 usecs (  21.480 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 4):   49.002 usecs (  19.584 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 5):   51.124 usecs (  23.435 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 6):   50.322 usecs (  21.546 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 7):   46.142 usecs (  21.541 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 8):   46.142 usecs (  23.460 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm( 9):   46.586 usecs (  21.543 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(10):   46.738 usecs (  21.537 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(11):   45.872 usecs (  19.516 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(12):   45.276 usecs (  23.501 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(13):   43.902 usecs (  21.541 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(14):   44.036 usecs (  23.500 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(15):   44.170 usecs (  21.471 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(16):   44.538 usecs (  23.502 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(17):   44.428 usecs (  23.453 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(18):   43.570 usecs (  19.590 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(19):   44.492 usecs (  21.540 usecs cpu)
cudnn_lstm(20):   44.610 usecs (  21.518 usecs cpu)

So just wait for the new packages.
